name: BeanSon
description: This game was created in the 'Infix Game Jam' in 3 days with the unity engine v2019.4.8f1. This is a copy of the game karlson2d by Dani. I made this since the theme was "remake". There are 6 levels including a tutorial level.  This might contain some bugs or glitches so please forgive me. The file is just a simple zipped and is checked for any viruses.
